TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IconSet implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 代表用于图标集条件格式规则的单一图标集。

span.span: Represents a single set of icons that are used in an icon set conditional formatting rule.
The IconSet object is a child object of the collection.

para.span: 图标集条件格式分配使用的属性对象。

span.span: The icon set for the conditional format is assigned by using the property of the object.

para.span: 通过传递常量之一的此属性设置为内置图标集之一枚举作为索引的属性对象。

span.span: You set this property to one of the built-in icon sets by passing one of the constants of the enumeration as an index of the property of the object.

para.span: 请参阅详细信息的示例。

span.span: See the example for details.

para.span: 以下代码示例创建了一个代表测试分数的数字范围，然后对该范围应用了图标集条件格式规则。图标集的类型将从默认图标变为五箭头图标集。最后，将阈值类型从百分点修改为硬编码数字。

span.span: The following code example creates a range of numbers representing test scores and then applies an icon set conditional formatting rule to that range. The type of icon set is then changed from the default icons to a 5-arrow icon set. Finally, the threshold type is modified from percentile to a hard-coded number.

example.code: Sub CreateIconSetCF() Dim cfIconSet As IconSetCondition 'Fill cells with sample data from 1 to 10 With ActiveSheet .Range("C1") = 55 .Range("C2") = 92 .Range("C3") = 88 .Range("C4") = 77 .Range("C5") = 66 .Range("C6") = 93 .Range("C7") = 76 .Range("C8") = 80 .Range("C9") = 79 .Range("C10") = 83 .Range("C11") = 66 .Range("C12") = 74 End With Range("C1:C12").Select 'Create an icon set conditional format for the created sample data range Set cfIconSet = Selection.FormatConditions.AddIconSetCondition 'Change the icon set to a 5-arrow icon set cfIconSet.IconSet = ActiveWorkbook.IconSets(xl5Arrows) 'The IconCriterion collection contains all of IconCriteria 'By indexing into the collection you can modify each criteria With cfIconSet.IconCriteria(1) .Type = xlConditionValueNumber .Value = 0 .Operator = 7 End With With cfIconSet.IconCriteria(2) .Type = xlConditionValueNumber .Value = 60 .Operator = 7 End With With cfIconSet.IconCriteria(3) .Type = xlConditionValueNumber .Value = 70 .Operator = 7 End With With cfIconSet.IconCriteria(4) .Type = xlConditionValueNumber .Value = 80 .Operator = 7 End With With cfIconSet.IconCriteria(5) .Type = xlConditionValueNumber .Value = 90 .Operator = 7 End With End Sub

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property _Default(Index As Object) As Icon
public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::Icon ^ default[System::Object ^] { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::Icon ^ get(System::Object ^ Index); };

span.span: Reserved for internal use.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Application

summary.span: 当使用对象识别符，此属性返回对象代表 Microsoft Office Excel 应用程序。

span.span: When used without an object qualifier, this property returns an object that represents the Microsoft Office Excel application.

summary.span: 如果使用对象识别符，此属性返回值，该值代表指定对象的创建者Application对象。

span.span: When used with an object qualifier, this property returns an Application object that represents the creator of the specified object.
Read-only.
Application (see above)

para.span: 您可以将此属性与 OLE 自动化对象一起使用以返回该对象的应用程序。

span.span: You can use this property with an OLE Automation object to return the application of that object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个整数值，指定图标集中图标的数目。

span.span: Returns a Integer value that specifies the number of icons in the icon set.
Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As XlCreator

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数等效于中的一个常量枚举，指示在其中创建此对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer equivalent to a constant in the enumeration that indicates the application in which this object was created.
Read-only.

para.span: 如果在 Microsoft Excel 中创建对象，此属性返回的字符串 XCEL，这相当于十六进制数字 5843454c。

span.span: If the object was created in Microsoft Excel, this property returns the string XCEL, which is equivalent to the hexadecimal number 5843454C.

para.span: 属性用于在 Microsoft Excel 中用于的 Macintosh，其中每个应用程序具有四个字符的创建者代码。

span.span: The property is designed to be used in Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code.

para.span: 例如，Microsoft Excel 具有 XCEL 的创建者代码。

span.span: For example, Microsoft Excel has the creator code XCEL.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() runtime managed
Public ReadOnly Property ID As XlIconSet

summary.span: 返回的常量之一枚举，指定设置图标中使用的图标的文件名设置条件格式规则。

span.span: Returns one of the constants of the enumeration, which specifies the name of the icon set used in an icon set conditional formatting rule.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Item(Index As Object) As Icon
public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::Icon ^ Item[System::Object ^] { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::Icon ^ get(System::Object ^ Index); };

span.span: The index number of the Icon object.

summary.span: 返回对象，它代表从图标集的单个图标。

span.span: Returns an object that represents a single icon from an icon set.
Read-only.

para.span: 值参数不能大于图标的图标集中的数目。

span.span: The value of the parameter cannot be greater than the number of icons in an icon set.

para.span: 若要查找的图标集中的图标的总数目，请使用属性。

span.span: To find the total number of icons in an icon set, use the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parent As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Parent { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回指定对象的父对象。只读。

span.span: Returns the parent object for the specified object. Read-only.
